body_html: This is a bug in the handling of IndexedSlices in while loop. We seemed to handle the shape tensor incorrectly. I need to talk to others about how the shape tensor should be updated within the loop. We should have a fix soon.
body_text: This is a bug in the handling of IndexedSlices in while loop.  We seemed to handle the shape tensor incorrectly.  I need to talk to others about how the shape tensor should be updated within the loop. We should have a fix soon.
body: This is a bug in the handling of IndexedSlices in while loop.  We seemed to handle the shape tensor incorrectly.  I need to talk to others about how the shape tensor should be updated within the loop. We should have a fix soon.
